loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i<=M' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'i<=M' always executed?
Can the loop with condition 'j<=N' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'j<=N' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i<=M' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j<=N' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'argc' affect subsequent computations?
Does the value assigned to 'argv' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Does variable 'optDelta' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
Is variable 'k' live at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'for( l=j-n; l<=j+n; l++ )' be considered dead code?
Is this statement not dead: “for( k=i-m; k<=i+m; k++ )”?
